eas_text: A CIVIL AUTHORITY HAS ISSUED A LOCAL AREA EMERGENCY FOR THE FOLLOWING COUNTIES/AREAS: Wapello, IA; AT 10:08 AM ON NOV 17, 2025 EFFECTIVE UNTIL 10:08 PM. MESSAGE FROM WSLF/CAP.
extra_text: City of Blakesburg, IA. Due to a water main break, water will be turned off from 1p to 4p today. A boil order in effect from 4 pm today for 24 hrs. pending negative tests.
